title: Ticket #1940: Safeguard Deltacloud credentials
description: In the initial implementation of Deltacloud support in Condor, the credentials needed to authenticate with the cloud services are stored directly in the job ad in the attribute DeltacloudPassword. This is visible to anyone who has read access to the schedd. The data should be stored more securely, probably in a file whose permissions the user can restrict, with the path to the file appearing in the job ad.
